byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Sandra E. Garcia, J. David Goodman, Benjamin Mueller, Noah Remnick, Michael Schwirtz and Liam Stack.
byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and AL BAKER

abstract: New York City Police Dept reports shooting of Officers Patrick Espeut and Diara E Cruz by man, identified as Malik Chavis, while patrolling Bronx public housing complex; Chavis subsequently killed himself, and both officers are in stable condition.
lead_paragraph: The officers were struck in the Bronx at a housing project, and one was seriously wounded, the authorities said.

headline.main: 2 New York City Police Officers Are Shot in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Two Officers Are Shot in a Bronx Housing Project

snippet: The officers were struck in the Bronx at a housing project, and one was seriously wounded, the authorities said.
